name: Republic of South
startIntroPart2: We have just been liberated by our amy from the claws of Brazil, now we shall show the world the real potential of our nation
declaringWar: We shall stand against the evil of our enemies
attacked: We wont be subjulgated again, we shall resist
defeated: We have lost, our amy shall regroup and try again another time
introduction: Bom dia, Our republic wishes you a good will
neutralNo: Your demands wont be accepted by our people
neutralYes: This is a great offer from you.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Our nation will  be reorganized and accept the peace.
tradeRequest: This will be a great offer from us.
